SLASH_WHATEVERYOURFRAMESARECALLED1="/MyFrame" SlashCmdList.WHATEVERYOURFRAMESARECALLED = function() if MyFrame:IsShown() then MyFrame:Hide() Test:Hide() RateFrame:Hide() ByFrame:Hide() else MyFrame:Show() Test:Show() RateFrame:Show() ByFrame:Show() end end end

////////--- Ashenvale KILL MOB Quests - Quest Items from Mobs //////

Starting Ashenvale "KILL MOB QUESTS" - There are 4 mobs we are about to kill. Tideress, Sharptalon, Shadumbra, and Ursangous.
Tideress leads to a sepearate quest - where as the other 3 lead to a final quest that gives an AMAZING item. Both do.
Try not to stop the bot - I have coded this perfectly so if you DO.. it will pickup where you left off.
